title: Update HTML document title to include “love”

requirements.summary: Update the user-facing HTML document title to include the word “love” without changing any other UI copy or flow.
acceptanceCriteria: After deployment, the browser tab/page title displays the updated title containing “love”.
No other step/page copy or button labels are changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Change the HTML <title> text to an English title that includes the word “love” (case-insensitive), ensuring this is the only user-visible text change and leaving the existing multi-step flow and animations untouched.
